entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT] Exe project referencing exe project results in the referenced exe being dropped. #47663
  • dotnet/sdk's non-incremental build is slow #47653
  • Error with Exe project dependency when setting -r in dotnet publish #47651
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.4xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #47650
  • [NETSDKE2E][Mac]NET10.0 preview2 Release Notes hyperlink on the Installation Wizard jumped incorrectly. #47648
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.3xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #47641

Closed

  • Is it intended that a default ImmutableArray<T>.Length throws NullReferenceException? #47647
  • Race condition in Publish targets #47654
  • `GivenDotnetTest` Failures #46923

PullRequests

Created

  • Add IBC switch and disable by default #47670
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create tsaoptions.json for VMR #47668
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Compare tar.gz files between VMR and current .NET builds #47667
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47665
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Check for Muxer path relative to base directory #47664
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • sln-add: Get project DefaultProjectTypeGuid #47661
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Refactor binlog and use in dotnet test and dotnet run #47660
    Area-dotnet test
  • Merge redist installer with redist #47659
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update MSTest templates for .NET 10 #47658
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add cgmanifest.json for test templates #47652
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Add missing VersionTools package version #47662
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build License Scan Baselines and Exclusions #47655
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Publish symbols of RuntimeAnalyzers #47598
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Permit specifying to use workload versions in global.json #47421
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Remove unnecessary 32bit arm architecture checks in the Windows build #47656
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Extract templates nupkg generation from GenerateMSIs.targets #47657
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47634
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert changes to NativeAot test due to runtime update #47443
    untriaged, Area-NativeAOT

Updated

  • Remove primary vertical concept from JoinVerticals #47338
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Add command 'dotnet project convert' #47500
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • dotnet CLI: Removed CommandLineValidation directory #47619
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Include only PackageReferences included at runtime in deps.json #46218
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • dotnet CLI: Move command folder sources #47620
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Update `dotnet run file.cs` spec with new ignored directives syntax #47543
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Update to AwesomeAssertions #47611
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #47569
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support launchSettings.json workingDirectory with dotnet run #42534
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #47514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
